name: mirzapur
description: A criminal mastermind who goes by 'The Professor' plans the biggest heist in recorded history.

name: Master
description: Master is a 2021 Indian action-thriller film where an alcoholic professor, JD, is sent to a juvenile detention center for three months.

name: V
description: V is a Telugu crime thriller where Nani plays a mysterious, vengeful killer who challenges a celebrated cop, played by Sudheer Babu, to a deadly game of cat and mouse.

name: leila
description: V is a Telugu crime thriller where Nani plays a mysterious, vengeful killer who challenges a celebrated cop, played by Sudheer Babu, to a deadly game of cat and mouse.
